amendment.description: Amendment extends the judiciary information technology fund; provides for the judiciary to retain certain offsetting receipts; enhances the membership in circuit judicial councils; sunsets civil justice expense and delay reduction plans; and establishes certifying officers in the judicial branch.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to extend the Judiciary Information Technology fund, allow the judiciary to retain any additional offsetting receipts derived from increases in miscellaneous fees charged in Federal courts, enhance membership in Circuit Judicial Councils, sunset the Civil Justice Expense Plan, and created certifying officers in the Judicial Branch.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coble amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
